item.title: “You need to have 2 mirrors” – Guenther Steiner believes Fernando Alonso should have been disqualified from US GP
item.description: “You need to have 2 mirrors” – Guenther Steiner believes Fernando Alonso should have been disqualified from US GP Guenther Steiner believes Fernando Alonso was driving an unsafe car after losing a side mirror following a high-speed crash with Lance Stroll.
